name: Why Karl Marx Would Have Joined MobM: A Visual Novel
name_original: Why Karl Marx Would Have Joined MobM: A Visual Novel
description:
Ever since the distant past of 2010, all the servers lived together in harmony. There was no war or famine, no restrictive governmental structures or toxic incentives. That is, until the warlord and his economically-enslaved nation attacked. 

Thrown into this conflict as a mere space traveler with only a hamster and a catgirl to guide you, it’s hard to see how you could possibly help bring this world back to prosperity. But as the story unravels and your amnesia clears, it seems more and more likely that you’re the only one equipped to solve a problem of this kind. 

Will this warlord finally be brought down? Will your new friends succeed in their mission? Will you ever return to your original quest, or will you just repeat the mistakes of your past? 

and why do I have a feeling the commies have something to do with it?

Features:

  • Over 5500 words
  • Over 80 original art pieces
  • A full 8 song OST
  • A detailed bibliography
  • A gripping narrative with many a twist and turns
